Expires: 2025-10-24

Active
We are looking for a skilled and passionate Full Stack Website Developer to join our growing team. The ideal candidate should have strong experience in both frontend and backend development and a deep understanding of building scalable, secure, and high-performing web applications. 🔹 Responsibilities: Develop, test, and deploy full stack web applications. Collaborate with designers and project managers to deliver high-quality solutions. Integrate APIs and manage databases effectively. Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code. Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize performance. 🔹 Required Skills: Proficiency in Laravel / PHP / React.js / Vue.js / JavaScript / Node.js Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and RESTful APIs Experience with MySQL / PostgreSQL Familiarity with version control (Git) Problem-solving mindset and attention to detail 🔹 Nice to Have: Experience with Docker / AWS / CI-CD pipelines Knowledge of security best practices 📍 Job Type: Full-time / Remote 📅 Experience: 1–3 years preferred 📩 Apply Now: Send your CV and portfolio to jobs@webrootlimited.co.uk with Expected Salary

Sales Expert

Posted: 2025-10-10

Expires: 2025-10-24

Active
𝐒𝐚𝐥𝐞𝐬 𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐭 – 𝐆𝐈𝐒 𝐒𝐞𝐫𝐯𝐢𝐜𝐞𝐬 (𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐧𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐂𝐥𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬) 📍 Location: Remote / Pakistan-based (with international client outreach) 🏢 Company: GeoEdge Services Are you passionate about technology, mapping, and global business growth? 🌐 GeoEdge Services — a leading name in Geospatial (GIS), Geotechnical, and Survey Solutions — is expanding its international presence! We’re looking for a Sales Expert for GIS Services who can connect, communicate, and convert international clients into long-term partners. 🔹 𝐘𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐑𝐨𝐥𝐞: 𝐀𝐬 𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐒𝐚𝐥𝐞𝐬 𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐭, 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐰𝐢𝐥𝐥: Identify and target international clients (especially in the USA, Canada, UK, Middle East, and Europe). Promote GIS, Remote Sensing, and Geospatial Analysis services to potential customers. Develop and execute sales strategies to increase global business reach. Build and maintain client relationships through professional communication and follow-ups. Collaborate with the technical team to understand service capabilities and present solutions effectively. 🔹 𝐖𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐖𝐞’𝐫𝐞 𝐋𝐨𝐨𝐤𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐅𝐨𝐫 Proven experience in sales or business development, ideally in GIS / geospatial / technical services. Strong communication skills (written and verbal) in English. Familiarity with international B2B sales and CRM tools. Ability to work independently and meet sales targets. Understanding of GIS, mapping, or remote sensing will be a strong plus. 🔹 𝐖𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐖𝐞 𝐎𝐟𝐟𝐞𝐫: Competitive base salary + commission on international sales. Work with a talented GIS & geophysical team at GeoEdge Services. Global exposure and growth opportunities. Flexible and collaborative work environment. 𝐀𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐭 𝐆𝐞𝐨𝐄𝐝𝐠𝐞 𝐒𝐞𝐫𝐯𝐢𝐜𝐞𝐬: GeoEdge Services specializes in GIS Mapping, Remote Sensing, Geotechnical Investigations, Water & Mineral Surveys, and Infrastructure Design. We help industries and governments make data-driven decisions using advanced geospatial technologies. Send us your CV's at: info@geoedgeservices.com
📍 Remote#Sales Expert🧳 Experienced Required

Expires: 2025-10-24

Active
🚀𝐇𝐢𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐠! Software Engineering Intern – PHP Location: Pakistan (remote) Duration: 3 months What You’ll Do 1. Assist the development team in designing, building, and maintaining web applications using PHP. 2. Help write clean, modular, and well-documented code. 3. Work on bug fixes, features, and improvements for both backend (PHP, databases) and frontend. 4. Learn and follow software development best practices (version control, code reviews, testing). 5. Collaborate with designers, frontend developers, and other team members to deliver features. Requirements 1. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. 2. Basic knowledge of PHP. Having conceptual knowledge of object-oriented programming (OOP) is mandatory. 3. Familiarity with MySQL or another relational database. 4. Basic understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript. 5. Good logical thinking and problem solving skills. 6. Eager to learn, take feedback, and grow. Bonus (if you have them) 1. Some experience with PHP frameworks (Laravel, CodeIgniter, etc.). 2. Knowledge of MVC architecture. 3. Git / version control usage. 4. Any personal or university projects using PHP. What We Offer Hands-on mentorship from experienced developers. 📩 𝐓𝐨 𝐚𝐩𝐩𝐥𝐲, send your resume to fizah.ahmed@intellixcore.ai with the subject line: PHP Intern
